Nightlight::

Nightlight received the commlinkbut she just can sent a brief 
messaje "we got your comm link, someone will go to speak with you... 
sorry if I'm pretty brief but i and some of my friend are attanding 
alittle trouble here"

After that she fired more energy balls against Vampirtron trying to 
hold him




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "~^*^Enter Starcasm^*^~" <Starcasm6@a...> wrote:
>                                     ::Razael::
> 
>     After a long, venturous run, Razael switched back to robot mode 
after the cunning femme bot found what she was looking for.  That 
being, the base that her scanners had notified her of.  Razael kept a 
distance and took cover by the nearest tree, in case defenses opened 
fire, or if transformers in the base attacked her.  She sent a 
transmission to the base(the Maximal base).
> 
>     "If you are recieving this message," she said, "I come in peace 
and would like to negotiate an alliance."
> 
>     Razael cautiously stayed by her cover, and waited for a reply 
from someone.
